articles.title: 'Will Wear It Everyday Until...': Israeli Parents Give Dog Tag to Elon Musk In Memory of Gaza Hostages - Times Now
articles.description: Elon Musk is on a visit to Israel to show his support after the horrifying Hamas attacks of October 7. During his visit, the tech mogul was presented with a dog tag by Israeli parents which paid homage to the hostages trapped in Gaza.
